mapper.insert: /* IMInfoInqHstryMapper.insert */ INSERT INTO im_info_inq_hstry ( info_inq_hstry_id, tbl_id, tbl_ref_id, ref_nm, inq_rsn, inq_url, menu_no, frst_reger_id, frst_reg_dt, frst_reger_ip ) VALUES ( #{infoInqHstryId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tblId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tblRefId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inqRsn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inqUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frstRegerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATETIME, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), #{frstRegerIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
